00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Test;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator);

00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Test - Test area for monkeying around with stuff.

00026 use strict;
00027 use warnings;
00028 
00029 #use CGI;
00030 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00031 #use WeBWorK::CGIParamShim;
00032 use WeBWorK::Utils qw/undefstr/;
00033 
00034 sub body {
00035     my ($self) = @_;
00036     my $r = $self->r;
00037     my $ce = $r->ce;
00038     my $db = $r->db;
00039     my $authz = $r->authz;
00040     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00041     
00042     $self->{pwd} = $r->param("pwd") || "helloworld";
00043     
00044     print CGI::p(
00045         "REQUEST_METHOD is $ENV{REQUEST_METHOD}", CGI::br(),
00046         "CONTENT_TYPE is $ENV{CONTENT_TYPE}", CGI::br(),
00047         "CONTENT_LENGTH is $ENV{CONTENT_LENGTH}",
00048     );
00049     
00050     use Data::Dumper;
00051     print CGI::pre(CGI::escapeHTML(Dumper($CGI::Q)));
00052     
00053     #print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
00054     my $start_form = CGI::start_form(
00055         -method=>"POST",
00056         -action=>$r->uri,
00057         #-enctype=>'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
00058         -enctype=>'multipart/form-data',
00059     );
00060     print CGI::pre(CGI::escapeHTML($start_form));
00061     print $start_form;
00062     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
00063     
00064     print CGI::p("before action:" . CGI::br()
00065         . " \$r->param('pwd')=" . (defined $r->param('pwd') ? $r->param('pwd') : "UNDEF") . CGI::br()
00066         . " CGI::param('pwd')=" . (defined CGI::param('pwd') ? CGI::param('pwd') : "UNDEF") . CGI::br()
00067         . " \$CGI::Q->{pwd}=" . (defined $CGI::Q->{pwd} ? "@{$CGI::Q->{pwd}}" : "UNDEF") . CGI::br()
00068         . " \$self->{pwd}=" . (defined $self->{pwd} ? $self->{pwd} : "UNDEF"));
00069     
00070     if (defined $r->param("submit") and $r->param("submit") eq "ChangePWD") {
00071         $self->{pwd} = $r->param("new_pwd");
00072         print CGI::p("pwd change requested, new pwd is ", $self->{pwd});
00073     }
00074     
00075     print "new_pwd: ", CGI::textfield({name=>"new_pwd",value=>$self->{pwd}}), CGI::br();
00076     
00077     print CGI::p("after action:" . CGI::br()
00078         . " \$r->param('pwd')=" . (defined $r->param('pwd') ? $r->param('pwd') : "UNDEF") . CGI::br()
00079         . " CGI::param('pwd')=" . (defined CGI::param('pwd') ? CGI::param('pwd') : "UNDEF") . CGI::br()
00080         . " \$CGI::Q->{pwd}=" . (defined $CGI::Q->{pwd} ? "@{$CGI::Q->{pwd}}" : "UNDEF") . CGI::br()
00081         . " \$self->{pwd}=" . (defined $self->{pwd} ? $self->{pwd} : "UNDEF"));
00082     
00083     my $hidden_pwd = CGI::hidden({name=>"pwd",value=>$self->{pwd}});
00084     print CGI::p("hidden field is being passed value=>".$self->{pwd}, CGI::br(),
00085         "hidden field is ", CGI::pre(CGI::escapeHTML($hidden_pwd)));
00086     print $hidden_pwd;
00087     
00088     print CGI::submit({name=>"submit",value=>"Refresh"});
00089     print CGI::submit({name=>"submit",value=>"ChangePWD"});
00090     
00091     print CGI::end_form();
00092     
00093     return "";  
00094 }
